Enable.description: Disable the device (false), or enable the device (true)

TagId.description: The id used in other parts of the system

Moving.description: The choke is currently moving (in progress)

SEM_A.description: Valve move command selection SEM A

SEM_B.description: Valve move command selection SEM B

Auto.description: Subsea equipment vendor decides how to send the command. In some cases, this would be both SEMs, in others it would mean a subsea system’s choice of a SEM.

Close.description: The command to the Choke is Close

Open.description: The command to the Choke is Open

Position.description: A number (in percent) indicating the percent open

OverrideInterlocks.description: Boolean indicating if the open or close command should override any defeat able interlocks

SEM.title: SEMEnum
SEM.description: The selection of which SEM to send the command to

Position.description: A number (in percent) indicating the percent open

Direction.title: ChokeCommandEnum
Direction.description: The direction for the valve, true is opening a valve, false if closing the valve

Steps.description: The number of steps to open/close the valve

OverrideInterlocks.description: Boolean indicating if the open or close command should override any defeat able interlocks

SEM.title: SEMEnum
SEM.description: The selection of which SEM to send the command to

MoveClose.description: The CIMV is moving in the close direction

MoveOpen.description: The CIMV is moving in the open direction

Position.description: The CIMV is in closed-loop Position control mode. Sending fix position

Flow.description: The CIMV is in closed-loop Flow control mode (auto regulate)

Manual.description: The CIMV is in open-loop Manual mode (compare it to step mode – i.e., move some increment relative to current). Note: some CIMV instance may not support this mode.

SEM_A.description: Valve move command selection SEM A

SEM_B.description: Valve move command selection SEM B

Initial.description: The value to initialize the TotalFlow to

FlowRate.description: Target flow rate. The CIMV will automatically maintain this target flow

SEM.description: The selection of which SEM to send the command to

ShutdownRequest.description: Boolean indicates that this command is part of a shutdown sequence.

Direction.description: Direction to move – Open or Close

Delta.description: A relative change in position from the current position as a percent.

OverrideInterlocks.description: Boolean indicating if the command should override any interlocks
Boolean indicating if the command should override any interlocks

Close.description: The last command to the valve was Close

Open.description: The last command to the valve was Open

None.description: No known command has been sent to the valve. The initial setting on start-up of a server.

Unknown.description: The Valve is in an unknown state. This value can be used when a subsea vendor does not have any last command information and does not know the state of the valve.

NotAvailable.description: The profile / signature is not available (in progress)

Completed.description: The profile / signature request has completed

Failed.description: The profile / signature request has failed

SEM_A.description: Valve move command selection SEM A

SEM_B.description: Valve move command selection SEM B

Direction.description: The enumeration indicates whether the command is to open the valve or to close the valve

Signature.description: Boolean indicating if a profile should be generated by this move command request

ShutdownRequest.description: Boolean indicates that this command is a shutdown move command

TargetTime.description: The UTC Time that the Server shall use to update its internal clock.
